Key Arguments: Censorship during the COVID-19 pandemic prevented open discussion and debate.
Fact checkers were unqualified and anonymous, leading to biased censorship.
Government and health authorities provided misleading information and propaganda.
Censorship led to economic harm and societal division.
Alternative health information and scientific studies were unjustly suppressed.
Main Themes: Censorship and its impact on democracy
Misinformation and disinformation during the COVID-19 pandemic
Accountability of fact checkers and government authorities
Economic and social consequences of censorship
Notable Quotes: Democracy ends when censorship controls free discussion!
The Government COVID propaganda response is the best example of why censorship should never be permitted.
Our Governments and health authorities constantly lied to us through Covid.
